attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scientific policy should be decided through independent scientific advice and rational based arguments around collated data. Scientific advisors should not be dismissed for speaking out where rational, independent conclusions differ to current policy; instead they should be applauded for it, and current policy should be changed to accomodate these conclusions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
